name: @parcelvoy/js-sdk
description: Parcelvoy Javascript SDK for collecting events

scripts.package:build: rimraf lib/ && npm run package:build:esm && npm run package:build:cjs
scripts.package:publish: npm run package:build && npm version $npm_config_tag --no-git-tag-version && npm pack && npm publish --tag=latest --access public

author: Chris Anderson
